title: Miley Cyrus takes a BRUTAL swipe at her estranged husband Liam Hemsworth
text:
Miley Cyrus took a savage swipe at her estranged husband Liam Hemsworth during an Instagram livestream on Sunday evening.

While broadcasting a video conversation with her new boyfriend Cody Simpson, who had just landed in Sydney, the 26-year-old singer threw shade at her famous exes, including Liam.

'There are good people out there that just happen to have d**ks. I've only ever met one, and he's on this live,' she said, referring to 22-year-old Cody.

Ouch! Miley Cyrus (right) took a savage swipe at her estranged husband Liam Hemsworth (left) during an Instagram livestream with her new boyfriend Cody Simpson on Sunday evening

Miley debuted her romance with Cody on October 4, just two months after announcing her separation from Liam in August.

The couple took part in a split-screen Instagram Live session, with Miley at her Los Angeles home and Cody at a hotel in Sydney.

After spending several minutes gushing over each other and complaining about spending time apart, Miley spoke about her experience dating 'evil men'.

Fighting talk: The couple took part in a split-screen Instagram Live session, with Miley (top) at her Los Angeles home and Cody (bottom) at a hotel in Sydney. During the broadcast, the Wrecking Ball star said that Cody was the 'only good person with a d**k she has ever met'

'There are good men out there, guys, don't give up,' said the Wrecking Ball hitmaker.

'You don't have to be gay, there are good people with d**ks out there, you've just got to find them. You've got to find a d**k that's not a d**k, you know.

'I always thought I had to be gay, because I thought all guys were evil, but it's not true. There are good people out there that just happen to have d**ks. I've only ever met one, and he's on this live.'

Former flames: Miley, who has dated both men and women in the past, enjoyed a brief romance with Brody Jenner's ex, Kaitlynn Carter (right), after splitting with Liam in August

Miley, who has dated both men and women in the past, enjoyed a brief romance with Brody Jenner's ex, Kaitlynn Carter, after splitting with Liam.

On August 11, the day Miley and Liam's separation was announced, photos were released of the two women cuddling and kissing aboard a boat in Italy.

She began seeing Cody after her fling with Kaitlynn fizzled out.

Moving on: Miley began seeing Cody after her fling with Kaitlynn fizzled out

Since debuting their relationship earlier this month, Cody and Miley have been sharing endless loved-up photos to Instagram.

Speaking to Daily Mail Australia on October 12, Cody's sister Alli Simpson said of the new couple: 'They're very happy and very in love. It's very new, but they have history.'

Meanwhile, it's believed Cody is in Sydney for the finale of The Masked Singer.

They're not shy! Since debuting their relationship earlier this month, Cody and Miley have been sharing endless loved-up photos to Instagram

It's widely speculated he is 'The Robot' on the show and has flown in for media interviews.

Cody was last in Australia in July, which happened to be when The Masked Singer was being filmed at Sydney's Fox Studios.

The Masked Singer Australia finale airs Monday at 7.30pm on Channel 10
description: Miley Cyrus took a savage swipe at her estranged husband Liam Hemsworth during an Instagram livestream on Sunday evening.
authors: Candice Jackson For Daily Mail Australia
